basicInfo.name: Miho
basicInfo.flavor: Bai Jiao offered Miho the chance to become an empress and gain even more power and strength. In return, he asked he made a request: for Miho to kill enemies for the Emperor and work with him to cover up their plans.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Violent Dance
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Magic Vulnerability. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 170% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Back Row Allies
 - Adds Effect: 2 Debuff Removal(s).
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Damage: Deals additional damage equal to 75% of Magic Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.

Skill 2.name: Overconfident Blow
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 160% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 185% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Damage: Deals additional damage equal to 85% of Magic Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.

Passive.name: Opportunist
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Life Drain upon activating a skill 2 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Weakness Hit Damage Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Heals HP equal to 30% of Max HP upon triggering Guts.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 30% of Max HP upon triggering Guts.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Tig, Pascal, meat, spicy food, survival of the fittest, power, authority, camellias, pretty and fancy things
profile.dislikes: Rin, fried food, stinky food, weak things, pitiable things
profile.story: Bai Jiao offered Miho the chance to become an empress and gain even more power and strength. In return, he asked he made a request: for Miho to kill enemies for the Emperor and work with him to cover up their plans.

basicInfo.name: Miho
basicInfo.flavor: Miho secretly entered the tournaments to appoint a new Four Lord and emerged victorious, only to be arrested shortly after. She escaped prison by betraying her former partners, but by then, the title of Four Lord was no longer hers.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Violent Dance
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Magic Vulnerability. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 130% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Overconfident Blow
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Opportunist
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Life Drain upon activating a skill 2 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Weakness Hit Damage Boost. [Always Active]

profile.story: Miho secretly entered the tournaments to appoint a new Four Lord and emerged victorious, only to be arrested shortly after. She escaped prison by betraying her former partners, but by then, the title of Four Lord was no longer hers.

basicInfo.name: Miho
basicInfo.flavor: For a girl that believed that those with strength deserved wealth and power, a vigilante group was not a good fit. Eventually, Miho left the group with her only friend, Tig, and lived alone.

 - Deals damage equal to 125% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
